newsitem.title: USA: ECRI future U.S. inflation gauge 105.3 Nov 15 wk.
newsitem.headline: ECRI future U.S. inflation gauge 105.3 Nov 15 wk.

text.p: The Economic Cycle Research Institute (ECRI) weekly future inflation gauge (FIG) rose to 105.3 in the week ended November 15 from 104.8 in the previous week, ECRI said.
Slower growth in real estate loans and a narrower yield spread between 10-year Treasury notes and three-month Treasury bills helped push the index up, ECRI said.
"The labor market looks about as tight as it has been in years, while the other indicators are mixed," ECRI said.
"As a result, the FIG remains little changed from its level six months ago," it said.
